snippet: Some experts have linked the outbreak to the water crisis in Flint.
abstract: Michigan Dept of Health and Human Services reports 10th fatal case of Legionnaires' disease among 88 cases detected in Flint area; some health experts contend outbreak is linked to city's switch to water from Flint River.
lead_paragraph: Some experts have linked the outbreak to the water crisis in Flint.

headline.main: Michigan: Tenth Death Attributed to Legionnaires’ Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Tenth Death Attributed to Legionnaires’ Outbreak
